channel.title: Changing loading bar color
channel.description: Well I've searched from top to bottom in my client.java in the client files for "0xFFFFFF" and haven't found out where to change the color code of the outline of the loading box from white to red. What should I do?

item.title: Changing loading bar color
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

I changed the color codes to 0xFF0000 but nothing happened :([br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 07, 2009, 08:16:52 pm[/size][hr]I went to public final void method13 and changed some color codes and it worked! Thank you sorta for sorta giving me a hint on where to look!

Read full topic
